sentences.en: Begin nearly one year from the project, because commercial pattern is pendent, be without progress almost.
sentences.cn: 自项目开始近一年, 由于商业模式悬而未决, 几乎毫无进展.

sentences.en: Each pendent twig and leafy festoon was in a blaze.
sentences.cn: 每根悬挂着的细枝和每一串树叶都在燃烧.

sentences.en: Pendant ( or pendent ): In architecture a sculpted ornament suspended from a vault or ceiling.
sentences.cn: 悬垂装饰: 在建筑中,从拱顶或天花板悬垂下来的雕刻装饰物.

sentences.en: Polystyrenes with 1, 1 - diphenylethene ( DPE ) pendent groups were synthesized via atom transfer radical polymerization ( ATRP ).
sentences.cn: 通过原子转移自由基聚合 ( ATRP ) 制备了含1, 1- 二苯基乙烯 ( DPE ) 侧基的聚苯乙烯.

sentences.en: Shadows of the pendent lamps flickered on the wall.
sentences.cn: 吊灯的阴影在墙上摇曳.

sentences.en: The pendent lamps lighten the whole hall.
When will the pendent problem be solved?
sentences.cn: 这个悬而未决的问题什么时候能解决 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 在…期间；直到…时为止；在等待…之际
悬而未决的；[昆]下垂的；未定的；向外伸出的

trans.tran_cn: 吊着的， 下垂的，悬垂的，悬而未决的
